{{infobox character | people=[[Númenóreans|Númenórean]] | name=Ailinel | image= | caption= | pronun=[[Quenya|Q]], {{IPA|[ˈa͡ɪlinel]}} | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Númenor]] | affiliation= | language=[[Adûnaic]], [[Sindarin]] and [[Quenya]] | birth={{SA|712}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death=unknown (aged 87+) | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house=[[House of Elros]] | parentage=[[Tar-Meneldur]] and [[Almarian]] | siblings=[[Tar-Aldarion]] and [[Almiel]] | spouse=[[Orchaldor]] | children=[[Soronto]] | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Ailinel''' was the second of the three children of [[Tar-Meneldur]] and [[Almarian]] of [[Númenor]]. Her older brother [[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion]] later became King [[Tar-Aldarion]]; her younger sister was [[Almiel]].{{UT|earlier}} Ailinel married [[Orchaldor]], who was descended from the [[House of Hador]] and they had a son named [[Soronto]].{{UT|Wife}} ==Etymology== ''Ailinel'' is a [[Quenya]] name. Its meaning is not glossed, but [[Helge Fauskanger]] suggests it means "Lake-woman" or something similar and consists of the elements ''[[ailin]]'' ("lake") + the feminine suffix ''[[-iel]]''.{{webcite|author=[[Helge Fauskanger]]|articleurl=https://folk.uib.no/hnohf/quen-eng.htm|articlename='''ailin'''|website=Quettaparma Quenyallo|accessed=26 January 2022}} == Genealogy == {{familytree/start}} {{familytree | | | | | | | | | ELE | | | | | | VEA | | | | | | |ELE=[[Tar-Elendil]]
